metadata.title: CVE-2017-5660 on Ubuntu Pro FIPS 16.04 LTS (xenial) - low
metadata.description: There is a vulnerability in Apache Traffic Server (ATS) 6.2.0 and prior and7.0.0 and prior with the Host header and line folding. This can have issueswhen interacting with upstream proxies and the wrong host being used.

criterions.comment: trafficserver package in xenial is affected and needs fixing.
